text: Excuse Me is a 1915 American comedy silent black and white film directed by Henry W. Savage, written by Rupert Hughes and distributed by Pathé Exchange. ==Cast== * George F. Marion as Porter * Geraldine O'Brien as Marjorie Newton * Vivian Blackburn as Mrs. Jim Wellington * Robert Fischer as Jim Wellington * Harrison Ford as Lt. Harry Mallory * J.B. Hollis ==References== ==External links== * * Category:American comedy films Category:1915 comedy films Category:1915 films Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films based on works by Rupert Hughes Category:Pathé Exchange films Category:American films
title: Excuse Me (1915 film)
